== Chekkiad (CT) (627354) ==

Chekkiad (CT) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 24.48 sq. km. and harbouring 5051 households with total population of 24246 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 67 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 475 km. Male population is 11194 and female population is 13052. Scheduled Caste population is 303 and Scheduled Tribes population is 220. Census Location Code of the town is 627354<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 67 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 67 km. Railway station is at Vadakara at a distance of 22 km.
